When Lady Right sees Thirst running at them she quickly presses a 
button next to the door as the door slides shut.  With one quick move 
she locks the door.  She quickly says, "Stupid Bot, with one press of 
this button."  She points at a button. "You will be injected into 
space, so calm down,"  During this time, Lady Right makes sure that 
all the other doors and vents systems are locked.
